description: value control signal will take during simulation
name: value

description: The minimum value the control signal will ever take
name: min

description: The maximum value the control signal will ever take
name: max

description: the units the diplay widget will use
name: widgetDisplayUnits

description: name of page where this register will show up in the app
name: uiPageName

description: name of panel where this register will show up in the app
name: uiPanelName
